about.details:
Incorporated in 2007, Siyaram Recycling Industries Ltd's main activities include the separation of brass scrap, the manufacture of brass ingots, billets and rods as well as the production of brass-based components, in particular parts for sanitary installations. All these activities take place in three plants in Jamnagar district, a major centre for brass components.

The production of brass billets and ingots, brass rods and plumbing parts is carried out in Unit I, which occupies an area of 4970 square meters. In Unit II, which covers 3629 square meters, brass sanitary parts are manufactured. Finally, Unit III, which covers an area of 3346 square meters, is mainly used for the separation of scrap. The area of 366 square meters is primarily used for the separation of scrap.

In 2023, revenue from operations amounted to 492.87 million. Around 67.06% of this revenue was generated on the domestic market, while 32.94% was generated on international markets.

The company distributes its products in around 18 states and Union Territories in India, with the majority of its revenue coming from Gujarat. The company's products are exported to countries such as China, Germany, Belgium and Oman.

In FY2023, Gujarat accounted for 56.40% of operating revenue, while Madhya Pradesh contributed 5.25%, Punjab 2.03% and Rajasthan 1.41%.

faqs.question: What is the Siyaram Recycling IPO?
faqs.answer:
Siyaram Recycling IPO is a SME IPO of 4992000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹22.96 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹46 per share. The minimum order quantity is 3000.

The IPO opens on December 14, 2023, and closes on December 18, 2023.

Cameo Corporate Services Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Siyaram Recycling IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Siyaram Recycling IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Siyaram Recycling IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Siyaram Recycling IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Siyaram Recycling IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Siyaram Recycling IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Siyaram Recycling IPO opens on December 14, 2023 and closes on December 18, 2023.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Siyaram Recycling IPO?
faqs.answer: Siyaram Recycling IPO lot size is 3000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,38,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Siyaram Recycling IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Siyaram Recycling IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is Siyaram Recycling IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for Siyaram Recycling IPO will be done on Tuesday, December 19, 2023, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Wednesday, December 20, 2023. Check the Siyaram Recycling IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is Siyaram Recycling IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The Siyaram Recycling IPO listing date is on Thursday, December 21, 2023.
